title: rustdoc ICE: `no resolutions for a doc link`

labels.name: T-rustdoc
labels.description: Relevant to the rustdoc team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: A-intra-doc-links
labels.description: Area: Intra-doc links, the ability to link to items in docs by name

body:
Found while reducing #108334, but the error is different (probably same root cause however) ### Code ```Rust mod m { pub enum ValueEnum {} // Also occurs for trait, struct } /// [`ValueEnum`] pub use m::ValueEnum; ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.69.0-nightly (4507fdaaa 2023-02-18) binary: rustc commit-hash: 4507fdaaa27ea2fb59a41df2ce7d1f290da53dae commit-date: 2023-02-18 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.69.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.7 ``` ### Error output
Backtrace

``` Documenting notclap v0.1.0 (/tmp/notclap) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'no resolutions for a doc link', compiler/rustc_metadata/src/rmeta/encoder.rs:2238:18 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f52384b0a7a - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h9ab7cd28287cf18f at /rustc/4507fdaaa27ea2fb59a41df2ce7d1f290da53dae/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7f52384b0a7a - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized::h3e7e6ca06d1d63cf at /rustc/4507fdaaa27ea2fb59a41df2ce7d1f290da53dae/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 2: 0x7f52384b0a7a - std::sys_common::backtrace::_print_fmt::h5b6184fd459f0c71 at /rustc/4507fdaaa27ea2fb59a41df2ce7d1f290da53dae/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:65:5 3: 0x7f52384b0a7a -
